title: As a officer or agent of a company, I need to change my company's type, so that my company can operate as a different company type (101943)

details.benefit: my company can operate as a different company type
met_when: knows how to re-register their limited company from private to public
knows how to re-register their limited company from public to private (incl. S100, capital reduction, share cancellation)
knows how to re-register their private limited company to a private unlimited company
knows how to re-register their unlimited company to a private limited company
knows how to re-register their public limited company to a private unlimited company
knows if this can be done electronically
knows if there is a fee
details.role: officer or agent of a company
